replies.body: It comes off that Warwick now has bigger ties to Singed than previously. Will there be any changes to his lore in relation to other champions, such as Soraka?
Please this
oh wow warwick rework i guess Machinegunnerusmc will be good again at this game LUL i mean he was best warwick in the world seasons 1/2/3/ yaboy
I HEAD THIS GUY HAS BIG BOBS AND STREAMS WEEDWICK AT https://www.twitch.tv/machinegunnerusmc
you mean this guy? https://www.twitch.tv/machinegunnerusmc He's a beast
{{summoner:11}} {{summoner:12}}  for free boost. Come to the light. Witness top boost feed {{champion:19}} machinegunnerusmc, yaboy
Only thing he loves more then Warwick is America.
The only thing he loves more than America is Taryn
Only thing he loves more then Taryn is WizWoofLifa
I bag to differ on that one Kappa
Lol dude is washed up no way he'll ever be good at the reworked champ looks too mechanically intense :^)
Machinegunnerusmc or www.twitch.tv/machinegunnerusmc is hands down the best Warwick player I have ever seen, you should go give that guy a watch and a follow!
best boosted warwick NA
How sad will ADCs be about this rework?
But his new ult can be bodyblocked or flashed away from
So, on a completely related note. Who has something against ADC's at riot?

As one of the few who own Urf The Manatee Warwick, I'm a little disappointed in the skin. I wish there was a way he could keep his classic manatee look and give him spatulas to fight with and his lobster bib. I know it's a limited skin that will probably stay over-looked but, old manatee > new manatee! :(
I agree 100%

As much as I love your idea,  I don't think this change will be on riot's agenda. I love the classic Urf much more and especially with a bib instead of the red and gold. It should at least look amazing for being limited I suppose.
I just saw the Warwick Reveal on Youtube....Can I have it now? Please? I will literally become a Warwick main soon. lol Though I do feel bad for poor squishes. ADCs RIP.
I am a WW main... lol. Rank 7 and all. Can'the wait for him to go live.

Ikr dude, that feel when you just want one of your favorite champions to be good. ;(
4.20 never forget. {{champion:19}}
Is the Hyena Warwick skin still gonna have a custom run animation?
Will Grey Warwick be available to us? I want it and I didn't get to refer anyone because I was still new :(

Will Warwick actually speak like a normal person in his quotes and champion interactions or will he grunt and snarl similar to how reksai interacts with other? Also warwicks lore used to have a connection to Sorakas is this lore connection now going to be gone?
I think they mentioned that he does talk, but when he goes in for the kill (with his W I presume) he stops talking and invokes his animal instincts.
His ult is no longer pure perfect hatred... but how long is it's potential range... assuming, say Ghost, Mobility boots, Deadman's plate, and Warwick's own maximum w speed?
The Video looked like it threw him really far. id say his max range with homeguards and everything is a touch past tower to tower

Will he be getting a legacy classic skin like the some other champions before him ({{champion:48}} ,{{champion:43}} ,{{champion:113}} )?
I'm asking because of some of the in game art we've seen on social media (updated versions of his current art style).
Is Warwick half dog, half man, half beast, or half beast, half dogman
He's half man, half bear, half pig. Kappa
{{champion:113}}
so he is a manbearpig. alright{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Will his unavailable skins be made available for purchase upon release?

I kinda doubt the Urf Warwick Skin will come back since it was a super rare skin (unless they do something on the same level as Championship Riven) and the Grey Warwick is also going to, most likely, be a no since that could only be retrieved by using the refer-a-friend system.
Also, what crimes did the dudes in his trailer commit? (I assume that they were filthy jaywalkers)
What kind of damage does WW do? Do his abilities deal %HP or flat amount?
A flat amount + %maxHP true dmg  ofc
As a secret Warwick  main I am glad he is getting a rework.
Also I hope there won't be any damage towards the backline unless any Mage or marksmen will have no mercy
I like that white scarred wolf look so much. His long snout and lunking chin in the initial artwork .. looked kind of strange to me and not all that "fiercely intelligent predatory".
Is WW still going to be jungle or move to other positions like top or mid assassin?
I would assume still in the jungle. Most of the popular top laners right now would beat him too hard
It says his ult can be body blocked, wonder if that means I'd end up ulting a Braum instead of the Ashe  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Not a huge fan of the hextech imagery, will he retain the savage werewolf style in some of his skin options without it?
So seeing as Warwick is more like a chimera what does it mean for his lore? Is Soraka now gone and is he sort of a vigilante now?

about time he got reworked 
he looks really cool :)
I was a ww main but gave up do to the better tiered champs people played at higher elos. I welcome a new spin on my favorite blood thirsty savage :)
Will we get another shot at Grey Warwick? I really want that skin!
